definitions.definition: used when referring to a time between twelve o'clock at night and twelve o'clock in the middle of the day:
examples: The first election results are expected around 1 a.m.

definitions.definition: abbreviation for amplitude modulation: a type of radio broadcasting in which the strength of the signal changes, producing sound of a lower quality than FM:
examples: You're listening to Radio Gold, broadcasting 24 hours a day on 909 AM.
